quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE) has launched Integrated Teacher Education Programme (ITEP) in 57 Teacher Education Institutions (TEIs) from the academic session 2023-24 throughout the country. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ITEP?

A.      It is a 4 Year dual-major holistic undergraduate degree.

B.      It will prepare teachers for the 5 stages of the new school structure.

C.      Admission will be carried out by the National Testing Agency (NTA).
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Greater Panna Landscape Council (GPLC) has been constituted under the chairmanship of Chief Secretary, Govt. of __________.
options: Uttar Pradesh
Madhya Pradesh
Rajasthan
Maharashtra
Jharkhand

quiz.text: Greater Panna Landscape Management plan has been prepared by which of the following organizations?
options: Indian Institute of Forest Management
TERI School Of Advanced Studies
NITI Aayog
Wildlife Institute of India
2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the _______ and the NITI Aayog have launched a hackathon, named LIFEathon, with young people from across the world to contribute ideas and innovations to promote sustainable living and climate positive behaviour as part of the Government of India's Mission LiFE.
options: United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP)
World Bank
United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)
UNESCO
1 and 2

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, ASPIRE is a bilateral program implemented by Government of ________ in association with Ministry of Power and Ministry of New and Renewable Energy.
options: United Kingdom
Germany
United States
France
Australia

quiz.text: What does ‘D’ in iDEEKSHA stands for?
options: Dependable
Development
Decarbonization
Distribution
District

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the “Swachh Sujal Shakti Samman 2023” has been organized by the Ministry of Jal Shakti to honour the __________ of rural water and sanitation sector.
options: civil society citizens
manual workers
women champions
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, first edition of Women Icons Leading Swacchata (WINS) Awards 2023 has been launched by Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs. Applications for the Awards are open in which of the following categories?
options: Self-Help Groups (SHGs)
Micro-enterprises
Startups
Non-Government Organisations (NGOs)
All of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), a function has been held to commemorate the success of “SWAYATT” Initiative. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to SWAYATT initiative?

A.      It is an initiative to promote Start-ups, Women And Youth Advantage Through e-Transaction (SWAYATT).

B.      It was launched in 2017.

C.      It was launched by Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology.
options: A and B
A only
B and C
B only
A and C

quiz.text: Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) is governed by clause 135 of the companies Act, 2013.  Act encourages companies to spend _________ of their average net profit.
options: 5%
3%
2.5%
4%
2%

quiz.text: Which of the following activities constitute CSR?
options: Eradicating extreme hunger and poverty.
Promotion of education, gender equality and empowering women.
Contribution to the Prime Minister's National Relief Fund or any other fund set up by the Central Government for socio-economic development.
1 and 2
All of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), EPFO has hosted online joint (employee and employer) option form in the unified portal for contributing on higher salary to the EPS-95. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to EPS-95?

A.      It was launched in 2005.

B.      It aims to provide pension benefits to employees working in the organized sector after their retirement.

C.      It has a minimum pension in between Rs.1,000 to Rs.2,000 per month.
options: A and C
B and C
B only
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, Department of Social Justice & Empowerment has signed an MoU with the Prajapati Brahma Kumari Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya, Mount Abu for spreading the message of __________ among the youth, women, students etc.
options: Nasha Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan (NMBA)
Pradhan Mantri Anusuchit Jaati Abhyuday Yojna (PM-AJAY)
Support for Marginalized Individuals for Livelihood and Enterprise (SMILE)
Pradhan Mantri Dakshta Aur Kushalta Sampann Hitgrahi (PM-DAKSH) Yojana
Atal Vayo Abhyuday Yojana (AVYAY)

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), an information regarding the number of homes completed under the SWAMIH fund has been shared.

Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to SWAMIH Fund?
options: Special Window for Affordable and Mid-Income Housing (SWAMIH) Investment Fund I was established in 2019.
Fund targets to complete over 81,000 homes in next 3 years across 30 Tier 1 and 2 cities.
The Fund is sponsored by the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs.
It is managed by SBICAP Ventures Ltd., a State Bank Group company.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution informed that Bureau of India Standards (BIS) has prohibited the sale of hallmarked gold jewelry or gold artefacts without _________-Digit HUID after 31st March 2023.
options: 10
8
9
6
12

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), Safe City Projects has been launched in Bengaluru, Karnataka. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Safe City Projects?

A.      It is an initiative of Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs.

B.      It is being implemented under Nirbhaya Funds Scheme.

C.      The Safe City project is being implemented on a trial basis in 25 cities.
options: A and B
B and C
A only
B only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), 1st Anti-Corruption working group meeting of G20 nations has been organised by Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances & Pensions at Gurugram, Haryana. As per the details shared in the meeting Enforcement Directorate has transferred assets worth about _________ to public sector banks that suffered losses around USD 272 billion due to frauds committed by high-net-worth individuals.
options: USD 100 billion
USD 180 billion
USD 200 billion
USD 150 billion
USD 250 billion

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), India and ________ have signed a Framework Mechanism for Mutual Recognition of Qualifications. It will help in the mobility of students and professionals between the two countries.
options: Australia
US
UK
UAE
France

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), 5th ASEAN-India Business summit has been held in which of the following countries?
options: Thailand
Cambodia
Malaysia
Laos
Indonesia

quiz.text: The Pandemic Fund is a partnership between which of the following entities?
options: Donor Countries
Co-Investors
Foundations
Civil Society Organizations
All of the above

quiz.text: Secretariat of ‘The Pandemic Fund’ is located in which of the following places/organizations?
options: Headquarters of WHO
Paris, France
London, UK
Hosted by World Bank at Washington DC, US
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Post Budget Webinar on ‘Developing Tourism in Mission Mode’ has been organized by the Ministry of Tourism. Which of the following is/are the themes of breakout sessions of the webinar?
options: Destination Centric Approach for Tourism Development
Convergence – The Power of Collaboration
Cultural Heritage for Promotion of Tourism
Impacting lives at grass root level through Tourism
All of the above

quiz.text: As per recent (March 2023) news, BIS (Bureau of Indian Standards) makes _______ concession on certification/Minimum marking fee for micro scale units.
options: 10%
80%
90%
60%
50%

quiz.text:
Recently (March 2023), the Unique flagship initiative ‘Dhara: an ode of Indian Knowledge system’ has completed one year. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ‘Dhara: an ode of Indian Knowledge system’?

A.      It is under the aegis of Ministry of AYUSH.

B.      Implementing agency is Indian Knowledge systems (IKS) division of AICTE, Ministry of Education.

C.      It aims for promotion and revival of multiple domains of Indian Knowledge systems.
options: B and C
A and B
B only
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Prime Minister has addressed a post budget webinar on ‘Urban planning, development and sanitation’. As per the information shared in the webinar, ______ of waste is being processed now, compared to 14-15% in 2014.
options: 60%
50%
75%
45%
65%

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Ministry of Power has mandated new coal or lignite based thermal plants to either set up renewable energy capacity equivalent to at least ________ of the thermal plant's capacity or procure that much supply of green energy under Renewable Purchase Obligation (RPO).
options: 40%
25%
30%
50%
60%

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Grievance Appellate Committee (GAC) portal has been launched. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the portal?
options: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) has launched the portal.
It will allow users to appeal against decisions taken by social media platforms to take down or retain the content posted by users.
It will endeavour to address the user’s appeal within a period of 30 days.
Portal Designed and Developed by Salesforce India.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), first meeting of "Chip 4" alliance has been held. Which of the following countries is not a part of the "Chip 4" alliance?
options: South Korea
Taiwan
US
Japan
India

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), Windsor Framework has been in news. It concerns which of the following countries/groups?
options: United Kingdom
European Union
Northern Ireland
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (March 2023), the Prime Minister of India has announced the establishment of a 'Startup Bridge' between India and _________.
options: Australia
Italy
US
Brazil
Indonesia
